text: mariyu miru allah ku sati (bhagasvamulu)ga kalpincina vatiki nenenduku bhayapadali? Vastavaniki, ayana miku e vidhamaina pramanam ivvanide, miru allah ku sati (bhagasvamulanu) kalpinci kuda bhayapadatam lede? Kavuna i rendu paksala varilo evaru santi pondataniki ar'hulo! Miku teliste ceppandi
